accomplishments: Implemented several coupon flows for Facebook and Facebook Lite advertisers on web and mobile
Introduced mobile coupon end-to-end testing and set up experiments to measure impact of launched experiences
Designed and implemented a visualization tool for internal debugging of Google Meet meetings
Implemented front-end with dependency injection and created mocks for unit tests
Designed and implemented custom review flow to reduce translation query waste
Created a Workplace chat bot, internal task bot, and query comparison tool
Participated in a 3-week industry level Android development course
Developed a unique Android app using Java front-end and Heroku back-end

challenges: One of the biggest challenges was dealing with the
. I had to account for failures when too many requests were made, and fetch data in batches.
projects.contribution: I was the sole contributor to this project.
projects.description: A web app utilizing the Spotify API to track monthly playlists and improve playlist management
